def_en: A farce is a humorous play in which the characters become involved in complicated and unlikely situations.

def_cn: (表演或写作的一种风格)荒诞,滑稽
def_en: Farce is the style of acting and writing that is typical of farces.

def_cn: 滑稽的场面(或事件);闹剧
def_en: If you describe a situation or event as a farce, you mean that it is so disorganized or ridiculous that you cannot take it seriously.
